title: Funny Jokes for Retired Folks: Gift Book for Retirement and Beyond
description: Whether you’re looking for a hilarious joke book for yourself or a funny retirement gift for friends, family or colleagues, Ralph has the perfect solution for you. Funny Jokes for Retired Folks is filled with laugh-out-loud knee-slappers, rip-roaring riddles and even a few dad joke groaners for good measure. You’ll enjoy 14 chapters of slapstick silliness and over 100 jokes that will have you rolling on the floor.Best of all, Ralph Lane’s jokes are accompanied by nostalgic illustrations that will double your laughs and triple your reading pleasure. The jokes in this book are made to be shared, so have fun enjoying them with nieces, nephews, neighbors and grandkids. It makes a perfect present for retiring teachers, soon-to-be retired coworkers and retirees from all lines work. If you're looking for a retirement party gift, this is the book for you. It especially comes in handy for making retirement speeches since it has the ideal jokes for a humorous send-off.And while you're thinking about book gifts, you’ll definitely want to grab one of Ralph’s other gift books for all occasions throughout the year. They are inexpensive gifting ideas that show you were thinking of that special person. Check out all of his fun and funny birthday present ideas and holiday gift-giving
author: Ralph Lane
